paper_title.en: Real Inversion Formulas of the Laplace Transform on Weighted Function Spaces

description.en: We investigate compactness of linear operators associated with the real inversion formulas of the Laplace transform, coming with weighted Sobolev reproducing kernel Hilbert spaces on the half line R(+). We present concrete reproducing kernels along with several typical examples.

paper_title.en: Real inversion formulas of the Laplace transform on weighted function spaces

description.en: We investigate compactness of linear operators associated with the real inversion formulas of the Laplace transform, coming with weighted Sobolev reproducing kernel Hilbert spaces on the half line R +. We present concrete reproducing kernels along with several typical examples. © 2008 Birkhaeuser.
